## Gene Details:

- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ATSMO1, ATSMO1-3, SMO1, SMO1-3</u>
- **Gene Name:** Arabidopsis thaliana sterol 4-alpha-methyl oxidase 1, STEROL C4-METHYL OXIDASE 1, sterol 4-alpha methyl oxidase 1-3
- **Description:**   methylsterol monooxygenase 1-3;(source:Araport11)
